body:
This has taken TOO long! But here it is! A lot of effort went into this!













If you have any ideas of what to be in the next issue, please leave a comment down below! PS; we are aware of any issues, it was too late to change them however and the don't really affect the reading... I'm not OCD enough to go back and spend 1 hour changing it XD
ENJOY! :D <3

replies.body:
Awesome official AV newsletter!  

Carrie I think that would be great for you to be the photographer, taking in game pictures etc.  

Also any scrim pictures, I think the players should take photo shots of wearing their team "outfits" during those scrims, take team pictures upload for the newletter , discuss intense battles, etc. This newletter has so many possibilities (^_^)v
